entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , La Vérendrye (Réserve faunique)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:12 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Maniwaki Airport 02:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
Temperature: 0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: -1.0°C
Wind: ESE 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy becoming mixed with rain in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain ending after midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
